name: angular2-express-starter
description: Starter application of Angular2 on Express

scripts.cleanup: cat ./client/css/AwardsPage/full.css ./client/css/AwardsPage/iphone.css ./client/css/AwardsPage/medium.css | cleancss -o ./client/css/Minified/Awards.min.css && cat ./client/css/GithubPage/full.css ./client/css/GithubPage/iphone.css ./client/css/GithubPage/medium.css | cleancss -o ./client/css/Minified/Github.min.css && cat ./client/css/ProjectPage/full.css ./client/css/ProjectPage/iphone.css ./client/css/ProjectPage/medium.css ./client/css/ProjectPage/global.css | cleancss -o ./client/css/Minified/ProjectPage.min.css && cat ./client/css/ProjectSingle/full.css | cleancss -o ./client/css/Minified/ProjectSingle.min.css && cat ./client/css/WelcomePage/full.css ./client/css/WelcomePage/iphone.css ./client/css/WelcomePage/main.css ./client/css/WelcomePage/med.css | cleancss -o ./client/css/Minified/Welcome.min.css && cat ./client/css/ResumePage/full.css ./client/css/ResumePage/iphone.css ./client/css/ResumePage/global.css ./client/css/ResumePage/medium.css | cleancss -o ./client/css/Minified/Resume.min.css

author: Vlado Tešanović
